intro: Build your farm and relationships and forge ahead on a quest of magic, monsters, and dragons. Level up your skills, explore multiple amazing towns and save the world!
description:
Discover four incredible lands, three farms to tend to, and an epic story to save the town of Sun Haven. Play as one of seven races, level through a diverse skill tree, customize your world with thousands of decorations, and romance your new neighbors. Can you become the hero of Sun Haven before it’s too late?

Manage Your Farm
• Play through 4 seasons and tend to seasonal crops and flowers using farming tools and spells
• Raise livestock and other fantastical animals from 3 different towns
• Utilize over 40 unique crafting stations for smithing, baking, gifting, and even jewelry-making
• Personalize your house and farm with tons of customization options, furniture items, and themed decorations

Explore the World
• Travel through 4 different cities: Sun Haven, Nel’Vari, Withergate, and the Brinestone Deeps
• Romance any (or all...) of the 23 available marriage candidates
• Fight your way through monsters using swords, crossbows, staffs, magic spells, or a mix of all four
• Unlock dozens of floors in the mines as you gather resources, gems, and ore
• Level up your strength to take down difficult bosses in the combat arena

Grow the Community
• Customize your character through different magical races, starting professions, and thousands of clothing options
• Start a family with your spouse by having a child
• Attend seasonal festivals and celebrate holidays with the townsfolk
• Complete the Sun Haven Museum by donating hundreds of items to the collection bundles
• Enhance your abilities by unlocking perks in a highly customizable skill tree
